text: 11.25 Kis 24.6-8, Jer 31.31-34, Sek 9.11, Hib 8.8-13 Pen tap ñɨbdɨl, ñɨg wayn kɨnag anɨb nep gɨl agak, Ñɨg wayn kɨnag anɨb ak, God nɨbop binɨb yad agɨl dɨnɨgayn agak takaw koŋɨm ak tek mɨdeb agak. Nɨkɨm yad ak ñen, takaw koŋɨm anɨb ak am wos gɨnɨgab agak. Ak nɨm, ñɨn akal ñɨg wayn awl ñɨŋɨnɨgabɨm ak, yɨp gos nɨgɨlɨg ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agak.
